comments:
Getting this error when trying to open "corresponding task" for ASM web repository, created from a standard repository template, for CVS changeset with the comment "applied code cleanup patch from bug 306210". 

Notation "bug XXXX" had been used in the comment and I hoped to see this working, but got a NPE instead.

Eugene: could you please provide a stack trace with the latest, or instructions to reproduce?  The line numbers have changed too much to figure out what's going on.  Perhaps the repository is null when given to the WebRepositoryConnector.

To reproduce add ASM CVS repository at :pserver:anonymous@cvs.forge.objectweb.org:/cvsroot/asm

Then checkout asm project into workspace. 
Form project properties assign task repository created from default ASM template. Then open History view for ASMifierAbstractVisitor class and try to call "Open corresponding report". 
It now shows popup saying "no repository found", and NPE goes into the log file:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.sandbox.web.WebRepositoryConnector.getRepositoryUrlFromTaskUrl(WebRepositoryConnector.java:117)

(In reply to comment #3)
> Eugene: does bug 165581 fix this?

I think so. I think I've added checking for null value there...
